label: [B][COLOR aquamarine]:::[/COLOR][COLOR white]BLUEPLAY[/COLOR][COLOR aquamarine]:::[/COLOR][/B]
info:

label: [B][COLOR lime]●[/COLOR] [COLOR white]TV AO VIVO[/COLOR][/B]
